items.title: UI Redesign - Mobile/Desktop Compatible
items.description: Redesign interface to work well on mobile and desktop. Should visually look like users are inputting directly onto an e-ink picture frame. Instructions clearly visible underneath.
acceptance: Responsive design works on mobile (320px+) and desktop
Visual design resembles e-ink picture frame
Text and image input modes available
Instructions clearly visible below the frame

items.title: Submission History Browser
items.description: Add submission history viewable with left/right arrows on the input screen. When viewed, content appears on the submission screen as if user was submitting it. No resubmissions allowed from history.
acceptance: History content displays in the frame area
Clear visual indication when viewing history vs new submission
Resubmit button disabled/hidden when viewing history
History stored in Firestore and persists across sessions

items.title: Add to History Toggle
items.description: Toggle option for submissions to control whether they are added to history. On by default, users can deselect.
acceptance: Default state is ON (add to history)
Toggle state is clear and accessible

items.title: Submission Queue System
items.description: Ensure submission queue handles multiple submissions properly. Each submission should be visible on display for at least 3 minutes before showing next one.
acceptance: Queue system ensures minimum 3-minute display time per submission
No submissions are missed or skipped
Multiple rapid submissions are queued properly
